metadata.dc:author: Clavería Aranguren, Ma Ujue
Ollobarren Huarte, Carmen
Echeverría Beroiz, Cristina
Zapata Elizari, Ana Isabel
Santos Laraña, Ma Angeles
metadata.dc:description: The authors deal with the topic of how to prevent falls by institutionalized patients with dual objectives: to identify and prioritize critical points for risk of falls and to identify action strategies while evaluating their importance and viability. All this study fits inside a parameter which contemplates patient security as a fundamental value in a health institution.
metadata.dc:title: Prevención de caídas. Estrategias de intervención.
[Prevention of falls. Action strategies].
